name: Subterranean Detectives Orin and Satori
description:
From the depths of the Earth to mountain peaks

A Touhou Project point-and-click fangame

An unprecedented crime has happened in Gensokyo, and the only one who can solve it is the Great Subterranean Detective - Satori Komeiji. Play as Satori’s assistant, Orin, as she sets out to investigate the case. Solve puzzles, search for clues, talk to people, and help Satori find the culprit!

You can find the soundtrack from the game here: 

https://soundcloud.com/user-740100457/sets/subterranean-detectives-orin

If you liked the game you can support me here:

https://ko-fi.com/magpieteahouse

Disclaimer:

All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, music, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fanwork, and is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators.
